segments.text: My mom is three years older than my dad , and they are like night and day.My mom is 5 footsweet and very nice , and very caring , and very cute , everybody tells her how young she looks , and how she resembles my sister , perhaps.My father is very much completely opposite that.He is a very bi 4 , on a good day , 5 foot 2 , I think in real life , and she is very nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When is the last time you talked to you parents ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I talked to them probably about two weeks ago . Yeah , everything is going well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to see them soon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going to go home after the holidays and we're going to have a Christmas kind of in January or February . Yeah , depending on when my brother can come in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . And who are you more like , your mother or your father ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I have traits of both , actually . I look more like my mother .
segments.speaker: S1
